abilities.description: Your unarmed HOV can be launched from orbit to splashdown into deep waters and holds several people and their equipment. When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.e6ed148eff82c171]{Face Danger} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.d9208f9b7d827aec]{React Under Fire} to navigate through hazardous waters, avoid obstacles, or evade an attack, boost. A single use rocket may be fired to return the HOV to your command vehicle.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.a2d7793b23c17489]{Secure an Advantage} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.13b2d777c6fb719d]{Gather Information} by scanning your surroundings with sensors, boost.
When you make a move using the sub's manipulator arms to perform a delicate or forceful task, boost.
